import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a tag by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tags/{TagId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single tag record by TagId for legacy integrations that still depend on tag metadata.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TagId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-query) or [POST /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/search-tags-by-query) to list tags, then extract `Items[].TagId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tags by name/type via [POST /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/search-tags-by-query) and note `Items[0].TagId`.
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/tags/\{TagId\}](/docs/api/tags/get-tag) to retrieve the full tag record.

**Minimal Required Fields**: TagId (path)

**Note**: This API is deprecated. Prefer newer tag management endpoints when available.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"TagId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier for the tag","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
